Add Tab State Change.description: Adds a function to be called when the TabStateChange event occurs.

Get Display State.description: Gets display state of the tab.

Get Label.description: Returns the label for the tab.

Get Name.description: Returns the name of the tab.

Get Parent.description: Returns the formContext.ui object containing the tab.

Get Visible.description: Returns a value that indicates whether the tab is currently visible.

Remove Tab State Change.description: Removes a function to be called when the TabStateChange event occurs.

Set Display State.description: Sets display state of the tab.

Set Label.description: Sets the label of the tab.

Set Visible.description: Sets a value that indicates whether the tab is visible.

Sections Get.description: retrieve a section control in the sections collection by using the get method by specifying either the index value (integer) or name (string) of the quick view control as the argument:
